idea-plugin.name: ToolWindow Manager Advanced
idea-plugin.description:
🛠️ ToolWindow Manager Advanced

Revolutionize your IDE workspace with multi-level ToolWindow configuration. Easily manage visibility of tool windows at global and project levels.

🌟 Key Features

  • ⚙️ Global default configurations
  • 🎯 Project-specific overrides
  • 🔁 Automatic settings application

📊 Hierarchical Management

🌍 Global Level: Set defaults for the entire IDE instance.
📂 Project Level: Customize tool window visibility per project needs.

🚀 Benefits

  • For Teams: Maintain consistency, reduce onboarding time, enforce best practices
  • For Developers: Switch setups fast, enjoy cleaner workspace, personalize workflow

💡 Usage Examples

  1. New Project Setup: Apply tech stack profile
  2. Code Review: Enable analysis tools
  3. Debugging: Activate monitoring panels

📥 Install once — customize infinitely!
